templates.title: Kylie Rose Gold
templates.prompt_text: Ultra luxury beauty campaign, Kylie Cosmetics aesthetic, full bleed edge-to-edge design, dripping rose gold liquid lip gloss texture filling entire background, soft pink marble surface, elegant woman with perfect glass skin, luxury skincare jar on velvet pedestal, millennial pink luxury, 9:16 vertical format

templates.title: Fenty Neon

templates.title: Cardi Glam

templates.title: Hollywood Glamour

templates.title: Glossier Clouds
